shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function. The swipedown event is triggered when the user swipes down form the top of the application.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the swipedown event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

                function onSwipedown() {
                    alert("Swipe down event occured.");
                }

                document.addEventListener("swipedown", onSwipedown);

                </script>
